text: Reverse transcription was performed using random hexamers and the Superscript III RT reverse transcriptase kit ( Invitrogen ) . The rabies virus cDNA templates were amplified using the Phusion polymerase kit ( New England BioLabs , Ipswich , MA ) , following manufacturer ' s instructions . PCR conditions consisted of 98uC for 30 s , followed by 40 cycles of 98uC for 15 s , 64uC for 20 s , and 72uC for 1 . 2 min . The final cycle was 72uC for 10 min .
